Sentencas: Environmental concerns and limited availability of natural resources have made solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) a promising alternative for large-scale electricity production.
Titulo: Decentralized Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A control system is needed for SOFCs to meet operational objectives and ensure safe operation.
Titulo: Decentralized Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Previous studies showed that the control of SOFC is challenging due to its slow response time, tight operating constraints and unavailability of some key measurements.
Titulo: Decentralized Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this work, simple yet reliable decentralized proportional-integral-derivative (PID) controllers are systematically designed based on a benchmark nonlinear dynamic model of SOFC [1].
Titulo: Decentralized Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The design procedure involves selection of controlled variables (CVs), input-output pairing selection, and PID controller tuning.
Titulo: Decentralized Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: For CV selection, a novel method is proposed such that maintaining the CVs at constant setpoints facilitates constraint satisfaction for all key variables.
Titulo: Decentralized Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Closed-loop simulations demonstrate that the proposed decentralized PI controllers are able to closely meet the control objectives of SOFC even in the presence of changing operating conditions.
Titulo: Decentralized Control of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
